Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9500. This is an exceptional deal considering the high demand and unique features of the product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
